Tutorial
========

If you already know Python, you already know most of the Brackets, it is called
Python Brackets for a reason, all Python code is valid Brackets code and all
Brackets code is valid Python code, you have all the awesomeness of Python,
and you have all the awesomeness of Brackets.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Contents:

   flow
   functions
   regex
   classes
   templates
